statements: SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE is_fraudulent = true;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_date FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount, is_fraudulent FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE customer_id = 2002;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM fraudulent_activities GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE transaction_amount > 10000 AND is_fraudulent = TRUE ORDER BY customer_id, transaction_date
SELECT customer_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_amount > 5000
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM transaction_records;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, description FROM transaction_records ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE is_fraud = true;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_records ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount), COUNT(*) FROM transaction_records GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE is_fraud = TRUE AND severity_level > 5;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_records GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, amount, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT account_holder_name, account_type FROM account_details WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, currency FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_id = 105;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_holder_name, balance FROM account_details WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, amount, currency FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT account_holder_name, account_type, balance, (SELECT AVG(amount) FROM financial_transactions WHERE account_id = account_details.account_id) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM account_details;
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT account_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance > 10000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM accounts INNER JOIN customers ON accounts.account_id = customers.customer_id WHERE account_type = 'Savings';
SELECT * FROM fraud_alerts WHERE alert_date >= '2021-09-01' AND alert_date <= '2021-09-30';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT account_id, account_type FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY account_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description FROM fraud_patterns WHERE detection_algorithm = 'Machine Learning' ORDER BY pattern_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.transaction_date, a.account_number, c.customer_name FROM transactions t JOIN accounts a ON t.account_id = a.account_id JOIN customers c ON a.account_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT st.transaction_id, st.amount, st.transaction_date, fp.pattern_description FROM suspicious_transactions st JOIN fraud_patterns fp ON st.transaction_id = fp.pattern_id WHERE st.amount > 5000;

SELECT c.customer_name, c.customer_email, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM customers c LEFT JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.account_id GROUP BY c.customer_id ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
